alert.note: Alert for Alcona; Iosco; Ogemaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alcona, southeastern Ogemaw and Iosco Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harrisville State Park to near Skidway Lake. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oscoda, Harrisville, Au Sable, Long Lake, Mikado, Whittemore, Skidway Lake, Plainfield Township, National City, Hale, Harrisville State Park, Wurtsmith Airfield, Bowmanville, Wilber, Prescott and Sid Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
